body_html: To be clear, this problem comes up when you compile Python from source, but when you ran ./configure you forgot to add the option --enable-shared. Recompiling Python with this configuration option solved my problem.
body_text: To be clear, this problem comes up when you compile Python from source, but when you ran ./configure you forgot to add the option --enable-shared. Recompiling Python with this configuration option solved my problem.
body: To be clear, this problem comes up when you compile Python from source, but when you ran `./configure` you forgot to add the option `--enable-shared`. Recompiling Python with this configuration option solved my problem.
